title: Fabio Ramos
text:
Fabio Ramón "Pitu" Ramos (born 14 June 1980) is a <a href="Paraguay">Paraguay</a>an <a href="Association%20football">football</a> attacking midfielder, for <a href="Torneo%20Descentralizado">Torneo Descentralizado</a> club <a href="Real%20Garcilaso">Real Garcilaso</a>.
Ramos started his career in <a href="Club%20Nacional%20%28Paraguay%29">Nacional</a> of <a href="Asunci%C3%B3n">Asunción</a> before signing to <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> side <a href="Rio%20Ave%20F.C.">Rio Ave F.C.</a> in 1998. Ramos returned to Paraguay in 2003 to play again for Nacional. In <a href="2007%20in%20Paraguayan%20football">2007</a>, he was the <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20de%20Paraguay">Paraguayan 1st division</a> <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20de%20Paraguay%20topscorers">topscorer</a> along with <a href="Pablo%20Zeballos">Pablo Zeballos</a>, netting 15 goals for Nacional of Paraguay.
He was transferred in the 2009 season to Ecuadorian giants <a href="Club%20Sport%20Emelec">Emelec</a>. In 2010, he joined <a href="Argentine%20Primera%20B%20Nacional">Argentine Primera B Nacional</a> (second division) side <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Tucum%C3%A1n">Atlético Tucumán</a>.
In 2012 Fabio play for <a href="Real%20Garcilaso">Real Garcilaso</a>.
